mdRecord.dcterms:title: West Point Administrative Building, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cram, Goodhue and Ferguson (American architectural firm, 1898-1913) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Completed around the same time as the Cadet Chapel, the Administration Building was completed in the Gothic Revival style to match the already existing architecture of the campus. It was constructed during the building phase taking place in the early twentieth century. [work]
